systems.name: Elina Instagram Reels
systems.va_instruction: Generate trending caption + 15 hashtags, post via Meta Graph API, cross-post to YouTube Shorts and TikTok.

systems.name: Printify POD Store
systems.va_instruction: Pull new products, post 2 Pinterest pins/day, sync orders with dashboard.

systems.name: Meshy AI Store
systems.va_instruction: Share AI product demos in Reddit and Discord design groups with store link.

systems.name: Cad Crowd Auto Work
systems.va_instruction: Auto-apply to jobs matching keywords in CAD feed, log accepted jobs to dashboard.

systems.name: Fiverr AI Gig Automation
systems.va_instruction: Maintain Fiverr gigs active; auto-respond to new leads; send order summary to VA Bot.

systems.name: YouTube Automation
systems.va_instruction: Upload Shorts and long videos, update description links, push metrics to dashboard.

systems.name: Stock Image/Video Sales
systems.va_instruction: Upload 10 assets/day, tag with top-ranking keywords, report approvals.

systems.name: AI Book Publishing (KDP)
systems.va_instruction: Publish formatted AI books, extract keywords from title sheet, report royalties.

systems.name: Shopify Digital Products
systems.va_instruction: Auto-send product launch emails using template set; log conversions.

systems.name: Lakshya Passive Stationery Export
systems.va_instruction: Send catalog to 500 importer emails; sync fulfilled orders to dashboard.
